title: Advantage of cross sectional over longitudinal

content.question: Researchers at a local hospital are interested in whether teenagers who use internet-connected devices are more depressed than those who do not. In developmental psychology, one advantage of doing this research as a cross-sectional study over using longitudinal methods is that cross-sectional research does which of the following?

choices.label: Involves subjects of the same age.

topic.text: 3.1: Themes and Methods in Developmental Psychology

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
